entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
